Row.Text: Your people look up to you in this moment. Long have they been subdued by a foreign empire, and the time has come to break the chains of oppression. The criollos of your region have gathered their forces and are ready to proclaim independence! Now is the hour of our victory!

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Start {1_Turns} Turns of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Anarchy.[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Receive a {2_UnitStr} unit![ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Receive {3_Quantity} {4_UUStr} units![ENDCOLOR]
The people of {1_CivName} has declared their independence!

The people have gathered at the main square on {1_Cityname}. Today we celebrate our most holy {2_DevotionName}. The faithful have asked for you to contribute to the festivities, as it is one of our most important traditions.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Gold} [ICON_PEACE] Gold.[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Start a We Love the King Day at the city of {2_CityName}![ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Start a Level 2 [ICON_FESTIVAL] Religious Observance Festival at the city of {2_City}![ENDCOLOR]
A Procesión is being celebrated at the city of {1_CityName}!

Great leader, although our independence efforts have been highly successful, some of the Libertadores oppose our current government and disagree with our policies. They have come to our capital with the intention of establishing a coup. We must stop them!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Your opposition will appear at the Capital, and the Capital will enter [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance.[ENDCOLOR]
